title-group.article-title: DÉCRIRE DES ACTIONS : RACONTER OU RELATER ?

abstract.p: It is necessary to redefine the criteria involved for a text to be telling a story, rather than recounting events or actions, or drawing a dynamic portrait. Contemporary difficulties with narration then appear symptomatic not of an ambition to tell stories better, but as disguised poetic constructions.
